Name: Godland : The Fire Quest
About the game: The world that once survived the apocalypse is now headed for its own destruction. The Great Empire of Drasko is driven by the desire to dominate ! The people of Gusandar decide to flee to an island, a promise of peace... Seen as cowards, and traitors, you are only running away from the inevitable, a fire that licks the flesh in its quest for destruction... Will you manage to save your people, to protect them from the fire ? Live as Ruban Gusandar, chief of the village of Gusandar, in this short Visual Novel and discover his history and the secrets that hide the island. Will war break out on the island of Gusandar ? Is peace impossible ? Discover the answer to all these questions by reading the short Visual Novel that is Godland: The Fire Quest Features: Short duration (1-1h30 minutes) Unique graphic style
